    • Field Detail

      • flags

        public int flags
        Configuration flags for tag tracking

      • events

        public int events
        Tag tracking routine configuration flags.

      • rssiDeltaFilter

        public int rssiDeltaFilter
        When NUR_TTEV_RSSI is enabled, this delta value defines how much the RSSI needs to change to.

      • positionDeltaFilter

        public float positionDeltaFilter
        When NUR_TTEV_POSITION is enabled, this delta value defines how much the X. Position is normalized 0.0-1.0 value.

      • scanUntilNewTagsCount

        public int scanUntilNewTagsCount
        Tag tracking continues inventory as long as there's more new tags found than scanUntilNewTagsCount

      • visibilityTimeout

        public int visibilityTimeout
        When TTEV_VISIBILITY is enabled, change event is generated when tag has been out of view more than visibilityTimeout milliseconds

      • selectBank

        public byte selectBank
        Memory bank used for simple filter mask. Used when NUR_TTFL_USESIMPLEFILTER is set in flags. @sa enum NUR_BANK

      • selectAddress

        public int selectAddress
        Simple filter mask data address in bits. Used when NUR_TTFL_USESIMPLEFILTER is set in flags.

      • selectMaskBitLength

        public short selectMaskBitLength
        Simple f mask data length bits. Used when NUR_TTFL_USESIMPLEFILTER is set in flags.

      • selectMask

        public byte[] selectMask
        Simple filter mask data buffer. Used when NUR_TTFL_USESIMPLEFILTER is set in flags.

      • inAntennaMask

        public int inAntennaMask
        Antenna mask to be used as the gate-functionality "in"-antennas

      • outAntennaMask

        public int outAntennaMask
        Antenna mask to be used as the gate-functionality "out"-antennas

      • complexFilters

        public NurInventoryExtendedFilter[] complexFilters
        Filter array. Used when NUR_TTFL_USECOMPLEXFILTER is set in flags. (NUR_INVEX_FILTER)

      • complexFilterParams

        public NurInventoryExtended complexFilterParams
        Inventory parameters. Used when NUR_TTFL_USECOMPLEXFILTER is set in flags. (NUR_INVEX_PARAMS)
